snippet: The government will release its economic growth and jobs reports this week, and beginning Thursday, investors can buy a piece of the microblogging network, Twitter.
lead_paragraph: The government will release its economic growth and jobs reports this week, and beginning Thursday, investors can buy a piece of the microblogging network, Twitter.

headline.main: Economic Reports for the Week of Nov. 4
headline.print_headline: Economic Reports for the Week of Nov. 4
